attributes.action: Provide public information on the current levels of funding short falls in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the prime minister to provide detailed information to the public regarding current shortfalls in education budgets. Is there enough money in schools to allow the schools to deliver the curriculum that they are expected to. It seems clear that there is a major funding gap that is preventing schools from delivering a fair level of education with all the materials required to do this.
